body:
Sorry for the double post, but I thought this would be more visible. See here:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/103](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/103)

After trying for a while and seeing this I'm wondering if this isn't possible yet. I'd like to use the schedule created from a daysim simulation for a subsequent E+ simulation within HB. I think I'm just failing to understand how to link all of the objects together. Is there an example file for this?



Thanks.
topic: Linking lighting control schedule to E+ simulation?

replies.body: I replied to issue. Let's keep any discussion related to energy components to github until we officially release them. Thanks.
